items.summary: Optimize the app UI for mobile usage by improving responsive layout, spacing, and touch interactions across the AppShell layout (sidebar + main content) so primary navigation and page content are comfortable to use on small screens.

Make the sidebar totally collapsible on mobile: provide a mode where the sidebar can be fully hidden (not occupying screen width) and can be opened/closed via a visible menu button; ensure the sidebar does not permanently cover or squeeze the content on small screens.

Fix the Life Lessons page so the category/menu options do not overlay and block the videos list; move the categories menu to the top of the screen (as a top filter area) while ensuring the videos are visible and scroll beneath it without being covered (match the problem shown in IMG_2564.png and IMG_2564-1.png).

Rename the user-facing 'Life Lessons' label to the new name requested by the user across the UI where it appears (page title and sidebar label), while keeping the existing route path '/mental-performance/life-lessons' unchanged.
